name: 瑞恩·格兰萨姆
name_full: 瑞恩·格兰萨姆 Ryan Grantham
introduction: Ryan Grantham is a Canadian actor. Among the series in which he participated are Riverdale, Supernatural and IZombie.In June 2022, his trial began for killing his mother on March 31, 2020. If convicted, he could face life imprisonment. At trial, the prosecution revealed that Ryan Grantham also intended to kill Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau, to which he confessed.
